Activity: Morning coffee and email check. See if @Mei, @Aisha, @Javier, and @David have responded. Read up on UI/UX trends in modern games.

Meeting with @Mei, @Aisha, @Javier, and @David. Discuss their UI design concepts and workflows. Understand how the UI elements will be integrated into the game world. Focus on technical feasibility and performance.
Discuss the UI design and the possibility to create a shared folder for UI assets for better collaboration.
Lunch. Need something brain-boosting today. Maybe a salad with lots of veggies?
Update the technical requirements document to include specific guidelines for UI assets. Consider factors like resolution independence, scalability, and localization.

Begin creating a simple test scene in the game engine to prototype the asset integration process. Experiment with different asset import settings and material configurations. Focus on identifying potential issues early on.
Refine the test scene. Make sure the basic assets look correct in the engine and the performance is acceptable. Write down the process for asset integration as documentation.
Final review of the tech requirements document and test scene notes. Prepare to present the initial findings to the team tomorrow.
